title: Price Smartphones, Expand Portfolio of Galaxy A Series in India – Outlook Business
description: Samsung plans to bring artificial intelligence capabilities to entry-price smartphones while expanding its Galaxy A series portfolio in India to strengthen its presence in the mass market.
content:

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra’s Privacy display is not a gimmick, here is why
description: Among all the Artificial Intelligence features that landed with the new Galaxy S26 Ultra in India, its Privacy Display stands out not just for innovation but for practicality, a genuinely useful feature rather than a marketing talking point.
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra has finally arrived in India, bringing with it a host of AI-powered upgrades and one standout innovation: the Privacy Display.

title: Hackers reportedly used AI tool from company that wiped billions of dollars from market to steal 150GB of Mexican government data

title: AI Stock Swings Show Split Among Europe’s Analysts and Investors
description: Equity analysts still attach attractive valuations to many European stocks at the heart of the selloff over artificial intelligence disruption fears, revealing a sharp contrast with investors over how to assess companies in the frontlines of the AI reckoning.
content: Equity analysts still attach attractive valuations to many European stocks at the heart of the selloff over artificial intelligence disruption fears, revealing a sharp contrast with investors over how to assess companies in the frontlines of the AI r... [377 chars]

title: Youth Struggles: Unemployment Crisis Among British NEETs
description: Nearly 1 million Britons aged 16-24 were classified as NEETs at the end of 2025, marking the second highest level in over a decade. The rising NEET rate highlights labor market challenges among youth, influenced by minimum wage increases, government policies, and economic factors like artificial intelligence.
content: The number of young Britons not in employment, education, or training (NEET) has reached nearly 1 million, according to data that reflects a troubling trend in the nation's labor market. This figure marks the second-highest level in over a decade, ra... [826 chars]

title: Samsung plans to take AI to entry-price smartphones, expand portfolio of Galaxy A series in India
description: SAN FRANCISCO, CALIFORNIA (US), Feb 26:  Leading consumer electronics maker Samsung will democratise Artificial Intelligence technology for its smartphones as it aims to bring this feature to entry-level devices, said a company official. The company, which launched its third-generation Galaxy AI series phone S26 here, believes that artificial intelligence (AI)-powered phone is going to dominate the smartphone segment, said Samsung India, MX Business, Senior Vice President, Raju Pullan. Samsung recently launched the Galaxy A07 5G smartphone in the Indian market, […]

title: Threat to large IT firms 'overblown', Cognizant's AI chief says amid Anthropic-driven disruption
description: MUMBAI, Feb 26 (Reuters) - ⁠Fears that new artificial intelligence tools could replace large IT services firms are "overblown" ⁠as clients still need help deploying and scaling the technology, Babak Hodjat, ‌chief AI officer at Cognizant, told Reuters in an interview.

title: Chipmaker Nvidia's earnings ease concerns
description: U.S. futures fell while global shares were mixed on Thursday after strong-than-expected earnings from chipmaker Nvidia helped ease some investor worries over the artificial intelligence boom.
content:

title: Lowe's CEO Says Mylow AI Assistant Is Fixing Major Headaches
description: Lowe's CEO Marvin Ellison is all in on artificial intelligence, with the home improvement retailer using tech at nearly every level of its operation.
content:
